column99:
January 2025 
   
 Head Mechanic position available at Simon’s Golf A/S 
 Due our long-serving mechanic relocating in February 2025, Simon’s Golf A/S is seeking a new Head Mechanic to join our team. 
   
 About Simon’s Golf: 
 Simon’s Golf, located in Kvistgård, North Zealand, is a prestigious and well-established course designed by Martin Hawtree. The initial 18 holes opened in 1993, with an additional 9 holes introduced in 2008. Renowned as one of Denmark's premier championship courses, Simon’s Golf continues to uphold its reputation for excellence. 
   
 What we offer: 
 
 Exceptional workshop and maintenance facilities 
 An extensive fleet of modern machinery, predominantly TORO, Belrobotics and Stihl 
 Substantial spare parts budget 
 
   
 Role overview & requirements 
 
 Strong organisational and communication skills 
 Conversational level of English also beneficial as we are a multi-national team 
 Daily communication and planning with the Superintendent 
 Good communication with the greens-staff regarding cleaning, fuelling and operation of machinery ensuring they report any defects 
 Advise and instruct the Assistant Mechanic/Belrobotics Technician 
 Proficient in grinding and back-lapping 
 Expertise in cylinder mower height and cut adjustments 
 Preventative maintenance program planning and execution 
 Ensuring the workshop is a clean and safe working environment 
 Drivers licence 
 Welding licence (beneficial but not compulsory) 
 Forklift licence (beneficial but not compulsory) 
 
   
 Additional benefits and information: 
 
 37 hours per week (overtime may be required occasionally) 
 Company pension 
 Assistance with temporary or long-term accommodation is a possibility 
 Competitive salary, negotiable based on experience 
 Golf privileges 
 
 If you are passionate about maintaining high-quality equipment and thrive in a collaborative environment, we would love to hear from you. 
 Please submit CV and references to: info@simons-golf-as.dk
